hypothesis_content.title: PolitiFi Memecoin Surge During US Political News Events
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, when major US political news triggers >200% increase in TRUMP/BODEN trading volume, the leading PolitiFi memecoin by volume will rally >18% within 6 hours, outperforming overall memecoin sector.
hypothesis_content.rationale: PolitiFi memecoins act as speculative proxies for political sentiment. News events create immediate narrative trading opportunities with high retail engagement. Volume spike confirms attention is genuine.
entry_conditions: Major political headline (debate, poll release, policy announcement)
TRUMP or BODEN 1H volume > 200% of 24H average
BTC 1H price change between -1% and +3% (stable backdrop)
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Political volume spikes fail to generate sustained price momentum, suggesting diminished memecoin-political correlation.
